# Create new migration version

```bash
alembic revision --autogenerate -m 'commit message'
```

## Пример форматирования

Автогенерация:

```python
def upgrade() -> None:
    # ### commands auto generated by Alembic - please adjust! ###
    op.create_table('dim_dataset',
    sa.Column('id', sa.INTEGER(), nullable=False),
    sa.Column('code', sa.String(length=16), nullable=True),
    sa.Column('path', sa.String(length=512), nullable=False),
    sa.Column('unique_key', sa.String(length=256), nullable=True),
    sa.Column('visible_columns', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
    sa.Column('metadata_table_name', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
    sa.Column('correction_table_name', sa.String(length=64), nullable=True),
    sa.Column('table_header', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
    sa.PrimaryKeyConstraint('id'),
    schema='portal'
    )
    op.create_table('dim_role',
    sa.Column('id', sa.INTEGER(), nullable=False),
    sa.Column('name', sa.Enum('ADMIN', 'PUBLIC', 'VIEWER', 'USER', 'OP', name='userrole'), nullable=False),
    sa.Column('description', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
    sa.Column('description2', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
    sa.PrimaryKeyConstraint('id'),
    schema='portal'
    )
```

После форматирования:

```python
def upgrade() -> None:
    # ### commands auto generated by Alembic - please adjust! ###
    op.create_table(
        'dim_dataset',
        sa.Column('id', sa.INTEGER(), nullable=False),
        sa.Column('code', sa.String(length=16), nullable=True),
        sa.Column('path', sa.String(length=512), nullable=False),
        sa.Column('unique_key', sa.String(length=256), nullable=True),
        sa.Column('visible_columns', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
        sa.Column('metadata_table_name', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
        sa.Column('correction_table_name', sa.String(length=64), nullable=True),
        sa.Column('table_header', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
        sa.PrimaryKeyConstraint('id'),
        schema='portal'
    )

    op.create_table(
        'dim_role',
        sa.Column('id', sa.INTEGER(), nullable=False),
        sa.Column('name', sa.Enum('ADMIN', 'PUBLIC', 'VIEWER', 'USER', 'OP', name='userrole'), nullable=False),
        sa.Column('description', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
        sa.Column('description2', sa.Text(), nullable=True),
        sa.PrimaryKeyConstraint('id'),
        schema='portal'
    )
```

## Provide schema to Enum

Autogenerate:

```python
sa.Column('name', sa.Enum('ADMIN', 'PUBLIC', 'VIEWER', 'USER', 'OP', name='userrole'), nullable=False),
```

Changes:

```python
sa.Column(
    'name',
    sa.Enum('ADMIN', 'PUBLIC', 'VIEWER', 'USER', 'OP', name='user_role', schema='portal'),
    nullable=False
),
```
